org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter
Class ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter.DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>
      org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter.ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FormRowHandler<K,R>, RowHandler<K,R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ValidOnlyIndividualFormRowHandler
public abstract class ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>
extends DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>

A more precise form row handler that narrows row data adding and saving down to only valid rows.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

addRow

public final void addRow(FormWidget rowForm)
                  throws Exception
Description copied from interface: FormRowHandler
This method is called when a new row was ordered to be added. The row data should be read from the supplied form (after converting and validating).

Specified by:
addRow in interface FormRowHandler<K,R>
Overrides:
addRow in class DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>
Parameters:
rowForm - The form that will be used to add new rows.
Throws:
Exception

saveRows

public final void saveRows(Map<K,FormRow<K,R>> formRows)
                    throws Exception
Description copied from interface: FormRowHandler
This method is called when the specified form rows were ordered to be saved to a file, database, etc.

Specified by:
saveRows in interface FormRowHandler<K,R>
Overrides:
saveRows in class DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>
Parameters:
formRows - A map of row keys that correspond to appropriate FormRows to be saved.
Throws:
Exception

addValidRow

public void addValidRow(FormWidget rowForm)
                 throws Exception
This method is called by addRow(FormWidget) to add only one valid row. The implementation of this method should add and save the row form data into a persistent data source.

Parameters:
rowForm - The row form data to add into a persistent data source.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that might occur during saving the data.

saveValidRows

public void saveValidRows(Map<K,FormRow<K,R>> rowForms)
                   throws Exception
This method is called by saveRows(Map) to save only valid rows. The implementation of this method should save the row form data into a persistent data source.

Parameters:
rowForms - The forms data from rows to be save into a persistent data source.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that might occur during saving the data.
